title: Well, it hit me... (Re: New Champ)
body: I'm getting the feeling the colorful mage is from Paretha! Were those taffa flowers in her teaser? Does she _induce **colorful** hallucinations_ using taffa flowers?

replies.body:
Hope it opens a door for a double lore update for {{champion:143}} & {{champion:76}} 

Paretha could be the new Kumungu, since Riot stated that they would change the name, it has been a while since we had the mention of a "Jungle" in Runeterra, I'm sure they won't lose the chance to introduce a new jungle themed region with this new colorful mage.

> [{quoted}](name=Zatsukino,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Pg3V9hgE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-10-05T20:58:10.994+0000)
>
> Hope it opens a door for a double lore update for {{champion:143}} & {{champion:76}} 
> 
> Paretha could be the new Kumungu, since Riot stated that they would change the name, it has been a while since we had the mention of a "Jungle" in Runeterra, I'm sure they won't lose the chance to introduce a new jungle themed region with this new colorful mage.

Wait they want to get rid of Kumungu?  What about {{champion:427}} ?  What about Red buff and the Kumungu affair?

> [{quoted}](name=wackywert,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Pg3V9hgE,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-10-05T23:13:23.614+0000)
>
> Wait they want to get rid of Kumungu?  What about {{champion:427}} ?  What about Red buff and the Kumungu affair?

This has been my sole argument for keeping the name.
You should go talk with Bioluminescence. She said that the name of the Jungle _WAS_ Kumungu in the lore, but over the centuries, it changed.
whats even the argument for changing the name?

> [{quoted}](name=EROTIC RAID BOSS,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Pg3V9hgE,comment-id=0001000000010000,timestamp=2018-10-06T04:41:34.183+0000)
>
> whats even the argument for changing the name?

Probably to avoid confusion between the old and the new lore. There's probably nothing wrong with the name but it likely reminds people of non canon information. A new name means they could start over with the jungle and bring it up to modern standard.

I mean, the old lore had Noxus, Demacia, Piltover etc too. 

Personally think they should just call it something similar to the old name unless there's a really  good reason not to.
For me Kumungu sound way better then Paretha for a jungle (it sound more like a greek city of some sort).
maybe the whole jungle region can get a name change but at least maybe create a city named kumungu in that region maybe like navori in ionia.

> [{quoted}](name=JonnyBoyy,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Pg3V9hgE,comment-id=0001000000010003,timestamp=2018-10-06T13:05:32.333+0000)
>
> maybe the whole jungle region can get a name change but at least maybe create a city named kumungu in that region maybe like navori in ionia.

They beat you to the punch. There's a Kumangra already.
but it doesn't mean that another rhyming name is not a possible location in that specific faction lol you might never know, there is kumangra,kumungu,kumangeh,etc. haha
B-but! I must know what the Kumungu Affair was! D:
I agree!
I would love for nidalee to get a lore update along with a minor rework
New form of cc, instead of blinding you when your hit by it you  start seeing hallucinations of your surrounding area (random skill shots champions running around your vision)

> [{quoted}](name=M00ndanc3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Pg3V9hgE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-10-05T19:11:18.301+0000)
>
> New form of cc, instead of blinding you when your hit by it you  start seeing hallucinations of your surrounding area (random skill shots champions running around your vision)

or get the "Attempting to reconnect" message while your game is nearly freezing
yes a new cc that doesn't cc the character it ccs the player

> [{quoted}](name=M00ndanc3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Pg3V9hgE,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-10-05T20:16:30.094+0000)
>
> yes a new cc that doesn't cc the character it ccs the player

How about it mails drugs to your opponents?
*woaw dude... thats a lotta weed mannn*

> [{quoted}](name=M00ndanc3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Pg3V9hgE,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-10-05T20:16:30.094+0000)
>
> yes a new cc that doesn't cc the character it ccs the player

Oh, so like a Shaco? Stacking tilt whenever you die to a good or bad Shaco.

Wait I just got tease of that mechanic last game.
Epic how Riot knows to sell hype for new champ.

"You account has been banned for unsportsmanlike behavior."

https://youtu.be/RSXcajQnasc?t=140

> [{quoted}](name=M00ndanc3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Pg3V9hgE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-10-05T19:11:18.301+0000)
>
> New form of cc, instead of blinding you when your hit by it you  start seeing hallucinations of your surrounding area (random skill shots champions running around your vision)

Dude this is such a good fucking idea and scary at the same time LOL
I really hope its not a yordle. I hate those : /

> [{quoted}](name=Ahris,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Pg3V9hgE,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-10-06T05:10:26.206+0000)
>
> I really hope its not a yordle. I hate those : /

Very likely isn't. I'm expecting a human or vastaya, perhaps a shaman. Though we do need a yordle champion or VGU (Corki?) soon, seeing as Bandle City's in dire need of a lore update.
Jeah with that specific marker in Ezreal's journal and the accompanying picture I feel like Paretha is of some importance. I'm intrigued! I hope we learn more.
paretha?

> [{quoted}](name=DeadUnborn,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Pg3V9hgE,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-10-05T21:35:34.940+0000)
>
> paretha?

Check out the map update released today.

Do you guys think it's gonna be another careless and childish looking champ like zoe? I don't think riot would release another champ like Zoe, but what else could ,,colorful mage" refer to? I just really wish that it was some witchy thing.
Only children can be colorful /s

> [{quoted}](name=SeaChange,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Pg3V9hgE,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2018-10-06T19:01:33.884+0000)
>
> Only children can be colorful /s

I really need something dark this time!

It's been 3 months since Pyke and i haven't heard anything about the new flower champ for a while - except for the champion roadmap. Not even an ingame teaser or the usual social media teasers. Let's hope we won't have to wait long for these because i'm really aching from excitement about the prospect of a new mage/support/ap jungler.

>Does she induce colorful hallucinations using taffa flowers?

That's what i missed in this game, killed by overdose...
so wait...anybody give me some intel of this teaser of a new champ? and ive read in-game, but i havent gotten that. can someone get me up to date?

> [{quoted}](name=MagiKyubi27,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Pg3V9hgE,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2018-10-06T15:54:33.296+0000)
>
> so wait...anybody give me some intel of this teaser of a new champ? and ive read in-game, but i havent gotten that. can someone get me up to date?

Check the latest champion roadmap.

When they say 'colorful' I hope them mean a colorful vocabulary. I want a hex-slinging witch who is just as mad and salty as the average LoL player.

And what's Paretha?

> [{quoted}](name=Ionian Vulpix,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Pg3V9hgE,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-10-05T23:09:04.654+0000)
>
> When they say 'colorful' I hope them mean a colorful vocabulary. I want a hex-slinging witch who is just as mad and salty as the average LoL player.
> 
> And what's Paretha?

Check out the map update released today.
Not that excited , the last mage we had " Zoe " was kinda near the same , Colorful , childish  and stuff like that
